import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Heading } from '../components/typography/heading' import { AppInput } from '../components/UI/appInput' import { AppButton } from '../components/UI/AppButton' import { useTheme } from '../hooks/useTheme' import { ThemeSwitcher } from '../components/UI/themeSwitcher' const Welcome = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [name, setName] = useState(null) const [number, setNumber] = useState(null) const isButtonDisabled = !(name && number) const handleNameInput = (e) => { setName(e.target.value) } const handleNumberInput = (e) => { setNumber(e.target.value) } return (
) } export default Welcome
